Legal_Issue: Whether the defendants' statement of defense should be struck out or require more detailed particulars
Procedural_Stage: Motion to strike or request for further particulars
Evidence_Assessment: Defendants' defense contained vague details; some assertions deemed irrelevant (e.g., plaintiff's motive)
Decision_Outcome: Paragraph 4 struck out; better particulars ordered for paragraphs 7–10; leave granted to amend defense by August 1, 1996
Burden_of_Proof: On plaintiff to demonstrate inadequacy of defense pleading
Legal_Rule: Federal Court Rules govern adequacy of pleadings, motions for particulars, and striking out of pleadings
Standard_of_Review: Application of procedural rules under Federal Court Rules
Grounds_for_Claim: Alleged infringement of mobile weighing system patent
Review_Standard: Compliance with pleading requirements under Federal Court Rules
Procedural_Fairness_Assessment: Defendants allowed to amend their defense to meet procedural standards
Key_Evidence_Considered: Content of defendants’ defense, particularly technical specifics and relevance of allegations
Legal_Framework: Federal Court Rules on pleadings and procedural fairness
Applicant_Challenge: Plaintiff moved to strike or require better particulars from defendants
Court_Result: Defendants must clarify defense with focus on material facts
Standard_of_Proof: Preponderance of probability in civil context
Defendant_Response: Denied infringement; provided initial defense with insufficient detail
Remedy_Requested: Striking out of defense or order for further particulars
Outcome: Defense partially struck, order for better particulars, and permission to amend
Remedy_Sought: Clarity and specificity in defendants’ defense pleadings
Resolution_Mechanism: Court-ordered amendment and provision of further particulars
Grounds_for_Inadmissibility_or_Allegatio: Irrelevant matter (e.g., plaintiff's motive) included in defense
Applicable_Process: Motion under Federal Court Rules for striking pleadings or requesting particulars
Outcome_of_Review: Defense required to be clarified and amended
Pending_Relief_or_Application: Motion to strike or for further particulars decided
